Sister of Silence Eris:
I do not know whether your suspicions were dispelled at the information that you have learned about the Embryo. But one thing I know for sure.
After Judith van ethinyl kidnapped by Solina and disappeared in the darkness, the organization Embryo ... Not disappeared. She now exist. Proof of this three-printing, leaped into the air. You have to expose the Embryo and tell the world the truth. Everyone should hear about this conspiracy. I have a favor to ask ...
